story.title: ABOUT
story.content:
I'm a multi-skilled creative dev blending code, design, and strategy across web and mobile.
I've collaborated on projects spanning Kenya, the US, and the UK, helping startups and brands launch dope stuff that works and looks good. Whether it’s front-end systems, backend logic, or user journeys — I get it done.

With more than six years experience from starting building static websites to fully functional front-end,backend systems and mobile apps, am always happy to adapt new range of styles. Web development and user experience is my favourite part of the journey.

Always leveling up and ready ; but always open to new opportunities and collaborations..
